resources.string: Connect Four (also known as Captain\'s Mistress, Four Up, Plot Four, Find Four, Four play, Four in a Row, Four in a Line and Gravitrips (in Soviet Union)) is a two-player connection game in which the players first choose a color and then take turns dropping colored discs from the top into a seven-column, six-row vertically suspended grid. The pieces fall straight down, occupying the next available space within the column.
The objective of the game is to be the first to form a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal line of four of one\'s own discs.
